Posts.Content: meny wrote: This is a study from 2007 but I thought it was really interesting.   http://www.cancer.gov/clinicaltrials/results/summary/2007/hypnosis0907 Women undergoing surgery for breast cancer who received a brief hypnosis session before entering the operating room required less anesthesia and pain medication during surgery, and reported less pain, nausea, fatigue, and discomfort after surgery than women who did not receive hypnosis. The overall cost of surgery was also significantly less for women undergoing hypnosis.  Log in to post a reply
